title: Destiny Pub Event: New York City
desc: Come join fellow? Destiny ?and Bungie fans in a night of camaraderie and competition!? Destiny Pub Event  is a free, unofficial, 21+ event starting at 9:00pm on Friday, December 11, 2015 at  Stitch Bar & Lounge  in New York City.? Destiny Pub Event  is a community-organized event that is uniquely characterized by hosting a variety of activities in addition to the usual socializing. Our event is not officially sponsored by Bungie. Planned activities include: Cryptarch's Quandary  - a packet of puzzles fireteams are to solve (e.g. word puzzles, ciphers, etc.). Puzzles are multifaceted and will require a healthy amount of brainwork.? Quiz of the Exile  - a  Trials of Osiris -themed pub quiz in which fireteams are asked a series of 20 questions based on the Destiny video game and grimoire. Teams will write their answers upon Passage Cards, which will be scored using a similar system to the in-game cards.? Other things ?-?There'll also be things like Destiny Pictionary, a survey, and a themed drink menu! Please contact  info@destinypubevent.com  for any questions or concerns. If you're interested in becoming a volunteer for Destiny Pub Event, please contact  nyc@destinypubevent.com !? Note about minors: ?A "handful of minors" (anyone under 21) are allowed into the event as long as they are accompanied by their parent. Please contact  nyc@destinypubevent.com  if you are a parent and plan on bringing your underage child. Links: Destiny Pub Event on Twitter ?-  Destiny Pub Event NYC Twitter Destiny Pub Event on Facebook ?-  Facebook Event Page
